help: --repository/-R <url>: the full URL of the content repository to clone

--path/-P <path>: The file system path of the content to copy
See the README for the full list
instructions: - If there's a default value, Enter one or more spaces to return an empty value
content_instructions: - If your site content is already available in a folder or repository, you can configure this here
- If you don't provide a source, a sample site will be created.
If there's a default value, Enter one or more spaces to set an empty value.
post_instructions: Your project is set up in the target folder.
We suggest that you commit the result to a repository BEFORE testing the site.
To test it, open a terminal in that folder and run:
err_target: Failed to find or create target folder ${target}
err_tools: Create-yaspp requires git and yarn to run properly
err_fileexists:
File ${file} exists in target folder ${target}.
Please remove this file/folder or try a different target folder (preferably empty)
err_config_file: Config file not found or invalid
err_partial_setup: The project is set up but some final operations failed
